name: Slime Cavern Breakdown
description:
Fumble in the darkness, tackle hordes of enemies, find keys, and go down floors in this stable version of a top down shooter!

There isn't much progression besides finding the key on each floor and entering the trapdoor, but the lighting, movement, menus, and basic behaviors of enemies are finished.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot.

Pressing Q changes the behavior of your shots.

Hold down R at any time to return to the main menu.
